targets.expr:
max by(mountpoint, device) (
  label_replace(
    node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
    "device",
    "$1",
    "device",
    "^/dev/(.*)$"
  ) * 0
)

options.content: Block device statistics may be missing if the device backing the filesystem is not a disk.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"
) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"
) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"
) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

label_replace(

  "^/dev/(.*)$"

+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",

  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"

+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.description: The number of read and write requests merged per second that were queued to the device

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"
) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_reads_merged_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: IOps read merged

panels.description: The number of read and write requests merged per second that were queued to the device

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",

+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)

panels.title: IOps write merged

panels.description: The average time for requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"
) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) / (rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)

panels.title: Disk Average Wait Time - Read

panels.description: The average time for requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) / (rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)

panels.title: Disk Average Wait Time - Write

panels.description: The average queue length of the requests that were issued to the device

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},

  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"

+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Average Queue Size

panels.description: Percentage of elapsed time during which I/O requests were issued to the device (bandwidth utilization for the device). Device saturation occurs when this value is close to 100% for devices serving requests serially.  But for devices  serving requests in parallel, such as RAID arrays and modern SSDs, this number does not reflect their performance limits.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint=~"$filesystem"},
  "device",
  "$1",
  "device",
  "^/dev/(.*)$"
) * 0
+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Time Spent Doing I/Os

panels.description: Percentage of elapsed time during which I/O requests were issued to the device (bandwidth utilization for the device). Device saturation occurs when this value is close to 100% for devices serving requests serially.  But for devices  serving requests in parallel, such as RAID arrays and modern SSDs, this number does not reflect their performance limits.

+ on(cluster_type, cluster, instance, device) group_right(fstype, mountpoint)
rate(node_disk_discard_time_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Time spent in discard
